name: Proper Greeting
desc: Agent provided an appropriate salutation, their first name, the company, and an offer of assistance.

options.name: Yes
options.toolTip: Interaction matches criteria.

options.name: No
options.toolTip: Interaction does not match the criteria.

name: Ownership Statement
desc: Agent summarizes the customer's issue to demonstrate active listening skills and provides an ownership statement.

options.name: Yes
options.toolTip: Interaction matches criteria.

options.name: No
options.toolTip: Interaction does not match the criteria.

name: Verification
desc: Agent verified at least two pieces of the customer's information.

options.name: Yes
options.toolTip: Interaction matches criteria.

options.name: No
options.toolTip: Interaction does not match the criteria.

name: Effective Solutioning
desc: Agent provided a concise and correct solution for each question or issue brought forth by the customer. In addition, Agent offers additional detail or insight related to the topic in order to eliminate the need for follow-up on the same subject.

options.name: Yes
options.toolTip: Interaction matches criteria.

options.name: No
options.toolTip: Interaction does not match the criteria.

name: Effective Notes
desc: Agent left detailed notes on the interaction; the content of the call and the solution provided, as applicable.

options.name: Yes
options.toolTip: Interaction matches criteria.

options.name: No
options.toolTip: Interaction does not match the criteria.

name: Completed Interaction Details
desc: Agent selected the most accurate and detailed contact reason for the content of the call, either the initial reason for the call, or the solution provided for the call.

options.name: Yes
options.toolTip: Interaction matches criteria.

options.name: No
options.toolTip: Interaction does not match the criteria.

name: Voice and Tone
desc: Agent maintained a positive and professional demeanor throughout the call and refrained from utilizing expletives or rude remarks. Where applicable, the Agent provided an empathetic response at the first opportunity and utilized positive positioning at every opportunity.

options.name: Yes
options.toolTip: Interaction matches criteria.

options.name: No
options.toolTip: Interaction does not match the criteria.

name: Phone Etiquette
desc: Agent asked permission to place the customer on hold, provided an estimate of how long the hold would last, and returned back to the call by thanking the customer for holding. Dead air on the call did not exceed 60 seconds at any given time.

options.name: Yes
options.toolTip: Interaction matches criteria.

options.name: No
options.toolTip: Interaction does not match the criteria.

name: Wrap Up
desc: Agent effectively summarized the content of the call and the solution provided. Agent provided an additional offer of assistance.

options.name: Yes
options.toolTip: Interaction matches criteria.

options.name: No
options.toolTip: Interaction does not match the criteria.

name: Close of Call
desc: Agent provided a closing salutation and thanked the customer for calling. If this was the first time the customer had called in, we provided at least two methods to contact us again in the future should the need arise.

options.name: Yes
options.toolTip: Interaction matches criteria.

options.name: No
options.toolTip: Interaction does not match the criteria.

name: MRD (Monitoring and Recording Disclosure)
desc: Agent delivered the monitoring and recording disclosure promptly.

options.name: No
